nodes.text: Breaktown was the district on Zakuul, ruled by corruption and tormed of weak by the strong. It was controlled by the Heralds of Zildrog, cultists of a mything serpent-god Zildrog, led by The Exalted. The Commander visited Breaktown twice: in the company of Senya Tirall while looking for the Lady of Sorrows in 3631 BBY, and in the company of Kaliyo Djannis while planting explosives at the power junctions in 3630 BBY.
Breaktown appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion, released with Update 4.0.
